title: Come Join Us Today!
text: Whether it's laying out a test PCB to evaluate a high power transistor, optimizing motor core geometry for maximum thrust, testing an embedded comms driver for fault tolerance, or creating content to increase public interest in Hyperloop, we’re united in the pursuit of building and learning amazing things together. Interested in joining? We’re looking for dedicated and talented team members to help us make the vision of Hyperloop a reality. Note: being a student-run team, all positions are volunteer.
